segments.text: Which subway should I take to get to the East Side ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , you have to take the shuttle to Grand Central .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Which train is that ? Which platform does it leave from ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's not on this platform.These trains are uptown and downtown , not crosstown.You have to go up these stairs over there .
segments.speaker: S1
